review: Very impressed at the performance of this device compared to the Roku HD that I have.  The interface isn't as fluid as the Apple TV, but it does offer more options such as Plex, and all of the Amazon content.  The integration with Amazon Cloud Photos, and music is great as well.A no brainer to purchase for the cost, especially when it originally was offered for 19.99 for prime members.
